author: sbrewin
msg: Corrected erroneous <strong> end tag which was causing a build failure.

author: sbrewin
msg: Added ability to filter messages by size.

author: noel
msg: Have list() verify the first message before returning, just in case file changed.

author: noel
msg: Committed some changes I started with Jason Webb while I was off-line.
2. Changed interface to the callback object to explicitly indicate whether the operation is finished or not.

3. Changed to read lines instead of characters.  Both I/O mechanisms are still supported (I did *NOT* re-indent the code because I figure that one of these blocks will disappear when we have finished the buffering changes), selected with a conditional flag: <BUFFERING> true </BUFFERING>.  Jason Webb is working on a BufferedRandomAccessFile class, which preliminary tests suggest results in 20x performance improvement.
4. Added more DEEP_DEBUGGING messages to help with development.
5. Changed to rely upon the index.  findMessage will reload the keys (once) if selectMessage fails.
6. Pre-size the index based upon file size.
7. Use finally{} to ensure that files are closed.
8. Minor formatting fixes to log messages.
Still more to do, marked in a TODO list, but so far this code is passing all internal tests (see TODO for caveat regarding key generation related to identical messages).
